body:
Hi. No problem. Thank you for reporting this.

I don't think that 32bits vs 64bits is the reason.

Can you try this file and let me know the results. This is the one with two ladybugs and you need to use GHPython 0.6.0.3: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/attachment/downloa...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/attachment/download?id=2985220%3AUploadedFile%3A1012171)

Thanks
